anime.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.description: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

anime.name: Attack on Titan
anime.description: In a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls to protect themselves from giant humanoid Titans, a young boy named Eren Yeager vows to eradicate the Titans after they destroy his hometown and kill his mother.

anime.name: Death Note
anime.description: A high school student named Light Yagami discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it. He decides to use it to create a utopian world without crime, pursued by the world's greatest detective, 'L'.

anime.name: My Hero Academia
anime.description: In a world where most people have superpowers, a boy born without any powers dreams of becoming a hero and enrolls in a prestigious hero academy.

anime.name: Spy x Family
anime.description: A spy must build a fake family to complete his mission, unknowingly adopting a psychic girl and marrying an assassin. None of them are aware of each other's true identities.

anime.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
anime.description: After his family is slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon, a young boy named Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and find a cure for his sister.

anime.name: Cowboy Bebop
anime.description: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easy-going bounty hunter and his partners.

anime.name: Your Lie in April
anime.description: A piano prodigy who can no longer hear his own playing is inspired to return to music by a free-spirited violinist.
